description:
The franchise that taught an entire generation the complete lyrics to Goldfinger’s “Superman” and inspired more than a few of us to pick up a skateboard is returning with another remaster. Tony Hawk Pro Skater 3 and 4 arrives on July 11 for PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch.

Just like its predecessor, Tony Hawk Pro Skater 1 and 2, THPS 3 and 4 brings back classic levels like Foundry, College, and Alcatraz, while adding a handful of origina
title: Where to pre-order Tony Hawk Pro Skater 3 and 4

description:
Grand escunites are a kind of aquatic life in Monster Hunter Wilds. They kind of look like glow-in-the-dark nautiluses (nautili?).

You’ll need to fish for them as part of a side quest, “Razzle Dazzle,” for Kanya at the Scarlet Forest base camp. This is the fifth and final of her side missions after catching your first fish, a
title: Where to find grand escunites in Monster Hunter Wilds

description:
Fortnite and Unreal Engine maker Epic Games is suing a player, Isaac Strock, for allegedly stealing and selling “hundreds” of Fortnite accounts. Epic Games announced the lawsuit in an anti-cheat update on its website on Feb. 27, filed that day in an Illinois court.

In the 21-page lawsuit, Epic Games claims that Strock used social engineering to access Fortnite accounts, citing at least four instances of Strock contacting Fortnite suppo
title: Epic Games sues player for stealing and selling Fortnite accounts

description: Elite Dangerous, the massively multiplayer spacefaring game first launched in 2014, has had its share of ups and downs over the years — sometimes even during the same in-game event. But after more than a decade online, there’s still nothing else quite like it: a digital rock tumbler that uses science and no small amount of in-game magic to create
title: Elite Dangerous community bounces back for Distant Worlds 3

description:
The Frost Sac is a monster part you’ll need to collect to forge several pieces of armor or weapons in Monster Hunter Wilds. But it’s an elusive part (as is the similar Freezer Sac).

In this Monster Hunter Wilds guide, we’ll go over how to get a Frost Sac and Freezer Sac — namely, which monsters you need to hunt.
title: How to get a Frost Sac and Freezer Sac in Monster Hunter Wilds

description: Gracium Ore is a material in Monster Hunter Wilds. It’s only found after you finish main campaign, hit High Rank, and can travel into the more difficult versions of its environments. You’ll need it if you want to upgrade some of your metal items to their higher tier versions.
title: How to get Gracium Ore in Monster Hunter Wilds

description: If you’ve been playing Monster Hunter Wilds, especially in its multiplayer online servers, you might have started to check out the Hunter Profiles for any of the other folks you’ve been grouped up with. It might seem like even the
title: How to change your title in Monster Hunter Wilds

description:
“Whoppers” are a subset of aquatic life in Monster Hunter Wilds. Whoppers are really big fish that require a (frustrating) minigame to reel in. There are (at least) four kinds of fish that qualify as a whopper: gajau, gastronome tuna, great trevally, and speartuna.

You’ll need to fish for them as part
title: Where to find a ‘whopper’ in Monster Hunter Wilds

description: Monster Hunter Wilds is an unbelievably fussy game when it comes to combat, especially if you’re new. You’ve got a weapon that takes a fighting game brain to memorize its moveset, pockets full of items that do something other than healing you, and a monster trying to kick your ass. Trying to manage it all without getting your fingers tangled is a challenge, but there’s a setting you can change that can make combat much easier.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds has a hidden setting to make melee combat significantly easier

description: A Seattle court has awarded Nintendo $7,030,158 as a default judgment against two counterfeit amiibo sellers,
title: Nintendo wins $7M judgment in amiibo counterfeiting lawsuit

description: The team behind Hulu’s post-apocalyptic mystery series Paradise vowed to answer season 1’s most burning questions by the finale and, blessedly, the writers delivered. After a devastating episode exploring the events that pushed humankind underground, episode 8, “The Man Who Kept the Secrets,” unravels the mystery of President Cal Bradford’s assassination and
title: Paradise’s finale writer on solving the murder mystery and what’s in store for season 2

description:
Why are over 2,000 people watching a live feed of murky water in a canal somewhere in the Netherlands? To ring the visdeurbel, of course.

As it has since 2021, the Dutch city of Utrecht’s annual Visdeurbel — or in English, “fish doorbell” — project went live on March 3, allowing folks around the world the ability to assist thousands of fish in navigating the municipality’s Oudegracht canal as they migrate to mate and lay eggs. The instructions for viewers are simple: if you see a fish on the camera, you help them out by pressing the website’s digital doorbell and alerting an on-location lock keeper, who then
title: Help fish navigate Dutch canals by ringing a digital doorbell

description:
Pokémon Go has another set of monthly paid research, “Power Up Ticket: March,” which you need to buy a $5 ticket for. The research gives a plethora of rewards, but is it worth buying?

Below we explain if the “Power Up Ticket” is worth buying in Pokémon Go and we list the steps to the “Power Up Ticket: March” Timed Research.

Is the ‘Power Up Ticket’ worth buying?

In the interest of financial efficiency, we’re going t
title: Pokémon Go ‘Power Up’ ticket research — is it worth it?

description:
The news may have moved on, but over 150,00 people are still reeling from the wildfires sweeping across southern California. To aid in the recovery effort, Itch.io is fundraising via its California Fire Relief Bundle. This $10 bundle includes roughly 180 games, but also features around 180 tabletop role-playing games and print-and-play titles in addition to a modest collection of game assets and other tools for creators.

The proceeds benefit CORE, a Los A
title: Itch.io’s wildfire relief fundraising bundle has over 150 games for $10

description:
After leaks, teases, and a very telling countdown (and even an “amuse-bouche” confirmation from Tony Hawk during an appearance on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert), Activision made it official on Tuesday: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 and 4, a remaster of the third and fourth games in the beloved skateboarding franchise, is coming this summer.

Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 and 4 will be released on July 11, for Nintendo Switch, PlayStatio
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 and 4 remasters revealed, now with a shredding Doom Slayer

description:
Gravid bowfins are a kind of aquatic life in Monster Hunter Wilds.

You’ll need to fish for them as part of a side quest, “Fishing for Flavor,” for Kanya at the Scarlet Forest base camp. This is the third of her side missions after catching your first fish and a then a
title: Where to find gravid bowfins in Monster Hunter Wilds

description: Xbox Game Pass is adding a bunch of roguelikes for paying subscribers in March. In addition to Balatro, which joined the Game Pass lineup on Feb. 24, the service is also getting deckbuilder Monster Train, firearm-dense dungeon-crawler Enter the Gungeon, and largely co-op-focused 33 Immortals in the early weeks of March
title: Roguelikes flood Xbox Game Pass in March

description:
In April 2023, Netflix announced it would be investing another $2.5 billion in the Korean entertainment industry over the next four years. While this investment spans film, unscripted series, and scripted TV, the massively popular K-drama format is at the center of Netflix’s strategy. 

Fast-forward to 2025, and we’re starting to see the results of that continued investment. The next slew of K-dramas coming to Netflix have among them one of the most expensive K-dr
title: The 5 best Korean dramas to watch on Netflix this spring

description:
The Fortnite found quest “Somebody’s planning a party in Crime City” and Joss’ story quest “Help Big Dill with the party” require you to, well, help Big Dill set up his party.

Both quests follow the same steps and require you to interact with Big Dill, but the quests can be very difficult: A lot of players land in Crime City and the quest might not even start for you. There’s a chance that Big Dill will not mention the party to you, so you’re left wondering if you’re missing something.

To help you save some time, we’ve listed out how
title: How to complete ‘Somebody’s planning a party in Crime City’ in Fortnite

description:
After their success delivering one of the best beat-’em-ups of the past decade with Streets of Rage 4, developer Guard Crush Games is working on something original. The studio announced its new game Absolum, which Guard Crush and co-developer Supamonks describe as an “action-RPG ‘rogue-’em-up’” that channels classic fantasy brawlers like Sega’s Golden Axe and Capcom’s Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara.

Absolum will be published by Dotemu in 2025 for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation
title: Streets of Rage 4 devs channel Golden Axe, D&D in new beat-’em-up Absolum

description: When director Josef Fares announced Hazelight Studios’ “next thing,” Split Fiction, at The Game Awards, he prefaced the adventure game as “some next-level shit.” Given Fares’ hat trick of narrative-driven co-op game successes in Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons, A Way Out, and 2021 Game of the Year winner
title: Split Fiction’s loopy fun co-op will make or break your relationship

description:
Split Fiction, the next game from It Takes Two makers Hazelight Studios, is out this week, and is the latest example that 2025 is a strong year for co-op games.

Like It Takes Two, which won Game of the Year at the 2021 Game Awards and has since gone on to sell a staggering
title: What time does Split Fiction release in your time zone?

description:
“What would you do if you did what you really wanted to do?” It’s the kind of question that a child would ask, but one that’s harder to answer than you might think. It’s also a moment shared in a podcast literally years ago, but one that I still remember fondly — and one that speaks very clearly to the given moment.

In this animated scene by Danica Dickison, a story artist and writer whose clients include Riot, Netflix, Disney, and A24, the questioner is a fox — a very special fox, in fact, having been magically awakened and only recently g
title: Brennan Lee Mulligan’s charming fox foil has a message for the haters

description:
Firestone is a resource used for crafting found in Monster Hunter Wilds.

As this is required in various weapons and armor sets, you’ll likely be wanting to track this ore down early on in the game.

This page explains where to find Firestone in Monster Hunter Wilds, and some tips on how to find gather some with ease.
title: Where to get Firestone in Monster Hunter Wilds

description:
Immersive Dungeons & Dragons show The Twenty-Sided Tavern is soon hitting the road for a national tour. But there’s still a chance to see it off-Broadway, with the show getting one last extension through May 11.

Part D&D actual play, part improv, and part immersive theater where the audience participates to determine the fate of the characters on stage, The Twenty-Sided Tavern debuted in May 2024. Since then, its run has been extended three times, with many
title: Twenty-Sided Tavern is headed on national tour — but there’s still time to the see the original

description:
Dress to Impress codes are the easiest way to redeem unique clothing items for free in the competitive fashion game.

Available free-to-play on your phone, computer, or console via the Roblox platform, the update for March is debuting a new game mode called Style Showdown.

This post lists all active codes for Dress to Impress for March 2025. We’ll continu
title: Dress to Impress codes for March 2025

description: While President Donald Trump has always seemed somewhat out of place in Washington, that’s nothing compared to what we’re now seeing with his pal Elon Musk. Working under the auspices of the president as a “special government employee,” Musk — the world’s richest man, who spent well over a quarter of a billion dollars to help elect Trump and other Republicans in the 2024 election cycle — is carrying out the administration’s mission to
title: Elon Musk’s ‘chainsaw for bureaucracy’ is… this gaming PC?

description: This far into 2025, you might think the conversation about the best games of 2024 settled. The Game Awards in December set the tone, the recent DICE Awards
title: Hellblade 2 leads very different set of nominations for BAFTA Games Awards
